name: Master Bedroom
description: Your main bedroom. You can build various pieces of furniture to make it more comfortabal. Your house can only have one master bedroom.

name: Arena
description: The arena is a place in your home that lets you kill things. Simply build a kyonshi of the monster you want to kill, and activate it for private farming.

name: Chicken Room
description: The chicken room can be filled with chicken coops, which produce eggs and feathers daily.

name: Pulp and Paper Room
description: The pulp and paper room allows for the creation of paper, a vital element in making kyonshi.

name: Salt Room
description: The salt room allows you to make salt from drying sea water, pumped in through a water pump.

name: Workshop
description: The workshop unlocks a number of higher level furnitures and house upgrades, if you can afford them.

name: Saw Room
description: The saw room enabled plank making from your house, at no gold cost to yourself! After you build it, of course.

name: Frost Forge
description: The frost forge lets you create a number of magical items that require extreme cold to make.

name: Guest Bedroom
description: Guest bedrooms can be added for your followers to sleep in. Improving the quality of their lives can improve the work they do for you!

name: Alchemy Room
description: The alchemy room provides a space to perform new kinds of alchemic reactions, previously not possible anywhere else.

name: Tannery
description: Tan things from the comfort of your own home!

name: Pet Room
description: A place for your pet to sleep and relax.
